text.more:
Oral Connections is a project that connects cameramen, journalists, directors, presenters in Australia's audiovisual industry. Applying
network analysis techniques to the oral history interview program hosted by the NFSA, provide first ever accessibility to a complete
visualisation of the various connections across media organisations and news channels; the graph becoming a representation of the way Australiaâ€™s
industry has taken shape.
text.title: Network Analysis NFSA Oral Histories
